details.adopted: This path has already been adopted on {{date}}
details.notAdopted: This path has not yet been adopted by anyone: do you want to be the first?
details.routingTips: Click the map to draw the route

alert.activateGPS: In order to access to all the features of the app you have to enable the GPS. Do you want to do it now?
alert.gpsAuthorization: The app can not access your position and the features based on it will not be available. In order to use them you have to authorize the use of your position from your device settings
alert.outsideExtent: It seems that you are outside the map bounds. The geolocation will be disabled. You can enable it again any time you want simply by pressing the dedicated button in the map
alert.routeDownload: You are about to download tise route. This process will download approximately {{size}} MB of data to your device. Do you want to proceed?
alert.noDownloadAvailable: This route is not yet available for download. Try downloading it again in a few days
alert.mapDownload: You are about to download the map. Do you want to proceed?
alert.downloadError: An error occurred during the download. Please retry later
alert.genericError: An error occurred. Please try again later
alert.loginNeededDownload: In order to download this route you need to be logged in. Do you want to do it now?
alert.discardRecordedTrack: You are going to delete the recorded route. Do you want to proceed?
alert.discardChanges: By selecting ok you will discard all the changes. Do you want to proceed?
alert.userAlreadyExists: The email {{email}} has already been used. Please, try to login instead
alert.abortDownload: Are you sure you want to abort the download?
alert.resumeTrackRecord: The application has been terminated while recording a track. What do you want to do?
alert.storageAuthorization: The app does not have access to your storage to download the file. In order to use them you have to authorize the use of your storage from your device settings
alert.fileDownloadError: An error occurred during the download. Please retry later
alert.fileDownloadSuccess: The file has been successfully downloaded in {{dest}}
alert.exportMessage: Insert the email where you want to receive the exported track
alert.exportError: An error accurred during the export. Please check your connection or retry later
alert.offlineDuringInitialization: It seems that you are offline. Go online to download the data needed for the first app initialization.
alert.initializationTooLong: Some connection problem are occurring. Check your connection and go online to download the data needed for the first app initialization.
alert.routingNotSupported: The route drawing is not supported for this screen size. To continue please restore the previous size. By clicking OK you will terminate the draw of the route
alert.routingPointNotValid: The selected point is not valid
alert.loginNeeded: You have to log in in order to access this feature
alert.operationNotPermitted: You do not have the permissions to access this feature
alert.geolocationNeeded: In order to access this feature you need to be geolocalized
alert.sessionExpired: Session expired. Log in to continue
alert.tooManyRoutingPoint: You have exceeded the limit number of selectable points
alert.routePasswordMessage: Insert the password to download this route
alert.backButtonLeaveRoute: Press again to leave the route
alert.backButtonLeaveApp: Press again to close the app
alert.logoutWarning: Are you sure you want to logout?

navigation.toast: Be careful, you moved away from the path by {{distance}}m
navigation.tooFar: You are currently too far to start the navigation

settings.title: settings
settings.termsAndConditions: Read the terms and conditions

home.whatToDo: What do you want to do?

credits.webmappContent1:
The app {{appName}} is developed and mantained by Webmapp.
Webmapp creates web, mobile and printed maps for Nature & Adventure Tourism.
For more information please visit our website
credits.mapContent: © Webmapp, distributed with licence CC BY-NC-SA

routeDownload.doNotInterrupt: Do not close the app during the installation process please
routeDownload.error: The download has been temporarily interrupted. Make sure you are connected to the network. The download will resume as soon as possible

login.loginHeader: Insert email and password to login to {{customerName}}
login.signupHeader: Insert the following fields to sign up to {{customerName}}
login.newsletter: I want to subscribe to the newsletter
login.privacy: I agree to the terms of the privacy policy
login.termsAndConditions: I agree to the terms and conditions

report.title: report your location
report.reportNotSent: The report has been accepted and will be sent as soon as possible
report.featureUnavailable: Feature not available in the browser
report.photolibrarySource: Use a picture from your library

adopt.missingFields: Fill in all the required fields
adopt.address: address, post code, country and city

help.0: After signing up, with just a click you would be able to download the routes to your device.
help.1: Every route has a reference map where there are the points of interest select by us.
help.2: By clicking on the icon you can access the description, the photo gallery and other info about that point of interest.
help.3: By clicking the geolocation button you can see your position (the blu point in the map).
help.4: By clicking again the geolocation button you activate the compass mode and the map will rotate and orientate to Nord.

offline.title: Offline map
offline.textContent: Download the map and enable the offline mode

events.loginNeeded: In order to participate in the event, you need to log in with your account

errors.alreadyAttending: You are already on the list of participants in the event
errors.notEnded: It is not possible to close a campaign before the running date
errors.alreadyEnded: The campaign is already closed: the requested operation cannot be performed
errors.onlyCreatorCanEnd: Operation not allowed. Only the creator of the event can decide to end it
errors.onlyCreatorCanUpdate: Operation not allowed. Only the creator of the event can add new images

attend.sure: Are you sure you want to participate in this event?
attend.success: You have successfully confirmed your participation in the event

end.title: End event
end.success: Event successfully concluded. The change will be visible in the app within a couple of days
end.sure: Are you sure you want to close this campaign?

update.title: Add photos to the gallery
update.success: Gallery successfully updated. The change will be visible in the app within a couple of days

login.403: Unable to log in. Wrong username or password
login.404: Unable to log in. Please check your network connection and try again

signup.401: This email address is already registered. You can log in with your email and password
signup.404: Registration could not be completed. Please, check your connection and try again
